attributes.action: For 1 week, Allow a fan to manage their Premier League team to help raise money.
attributes.additional_details:
Something fun and worthwhile to help those financially who are really in need. Footballers get paid a lot of money, and it would just be amazing to see them help by allowing a fan to achieve their dream of managing a premier league team and all wages for that 1 week are donated to help those in serious need. I’m sure the players would be on board with this too, would be fun!

Discuss with the FA to make this happen. To make a difference.
attributes.background: All premier league footballers wages for 1 week are donated to those really in need of financial & mental health support during the Covid-19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Running an initiative of this kind would be a decision for individual clubs and the Premier League, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can get in touch with the Premier League at:
https://www.premierleague.com/contact/getintouch
